name: Groot Platformer
description:
This is  a proyect of https://github.com/WaleedYaser/GrootPlatformerGame

the credit of the creation of the game goes to him.

Me and a partner worked with this proyect to give it some "details" like a main menu, some textures to the background (Partner´s work) and some bug fixing (My work) in the hope that this version of Groot platformer goes smooth, here it is.

In a future i would like to give some more details and level and make it more fun that it already is

Enjoy the game.
